reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some saying it fits as expected while others mention it runs a bit large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute wrap sweater
items.body: Fits as expected. Color is just as the picture. I do like the sleeves and the sweater wraps nicely. Read more
items.author: OMM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a littel large but is gorgeous!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater! I was surprised that it ran a bit large though. I ordered another in a Medium and will update my review but I always receive loads of compliments when I wear it. It's soft, cozy, and flattering. The weight is just right for a crisp fall day. If you like a more cropped sweater that can be dressed up or down, I highly recommend this very classy sweater. Edited to add: The medium fit like a dream and I will most likely order more colors! Read more
items.author: M. Robertson

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute idea, poor execution
items.body: I really wanted to like this sweater, but it fits like a crop sweater. I have an extremely short torso and this was way too short on me to be comfortable. Read more
items.author: sop1lady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fit; just like the picture
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater! It fits just like the picture. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty
items.body: I really like this sweater! The fabric is soft and light weight, and not bulky or heavy. The color is very pretty. It is a little shorter than I expected but I still like it. I got it to wear over dresses this fall and it’s perfect for that. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Measurements!
items.body: Love this, quality material!!! My recommendation is I’d size down. I’m a large / medium because of my chest measurements and I think a small would have fit best / more flattering as there is plenty of wrap around material. But also probably depends on body type, I’m an hourglass with shorter torso. I ordered a medium, but will get a small if I order again. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Odd shape
items.body: Too cropped and asymmetrical to fit correctly Read more
items.author: Jenni Slus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: love it. Very flattering. I ordered two other colors Read more
items.author: P. Robbins

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Dusty Blue, Coffee Brown, Dark Green, Deep Khaki, Khaki, Pink, White, Deep Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
